member_organisations: None - TOPRA is an organisation of individual professionals only
fields_of_interest: Education and training, Business and Industry, Single market, Research and innovation, Public Health, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives: all activities related to the regulation of human and veterinary healthcare products, including devices, ATMP and pharma and biotech
organisation_name: The Organisation for Professionals in Regulatory Affairs (TOPRA)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
Vision - 
Enabling and promoting excellence for the healthcare regulatory profession 
  
Mission - 
To represent and promote the global healthcare regulatory profession; and to provide to its members top-quality, relevant support with a European focus
